name: Gymkhanage
description:
This is the Gymkhanage battle arena where you can play versus bots. Fun, chaotic, cut-throat multiplayer vehicular mayhem.

Let theft, carnage and cunning be your motto. Support your teammates, outwit and back-stab your enemies. Snatch flags, grab power-ups, but don't forget to protect your base.

Keyboard controls: WASD & space

Points are scored by collecting up to 3 flags at a time and returning to your base (you are on the RED team). Minor points are awarded for killing other players. Other teams points will go down if you steal flags from their base.

This is a single developer, indie game so please get involved!

  • Web: www.gymkhanage.com
  • Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1302970/Gymkhanage/
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gymkhanage/
  • Discord: https://discord.gg/G7XsMuK
Full version features
  • 3rd Person action shooter
  • Physics based MOBA
  • Multiple game modes - Resource grab and race
  • Battle Arena, Train Hold-up and Roller derby maps
  • Vehicle choices: Charge! the hot-rod tank, the Green Meanie or Doc, the support drone

Gymkhanage is a community focused indie game that encourages your feedback on game balance and features.
